allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add core Digital FTE components

- Add Gmail watcher with OAuth2 authentication
- Add orchestrator with Ralph Wiggum loop pattern
- Add utility modules \(file_manager, logger\)
- Implement priority detection from email keywords
- Add audit logging for all actions

Components:
- src/watchers/gmail_watcher.py: Monitors Gmail for new emails
- src/orchestrator.py: Main processing loop with retry logic
- src/utils/file_manager.py: Vault file operations
- src/utils/logger.py: Structured audit logging

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
